name: hurdle
content:
hurdle noun
(FENCE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] a frame or fence for jumping over in a race: He fell at the last hurdle.clear a hurdle She cleared (= jumped over) all the hurdles easily and raced to the finishing line.
worradirek/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages hurdles [ plural ]
a race in which people or horses jump over hurdles: the 400-metre hurdles
